options.content: DASHBOARD

targets.query: SELECT last("value") FROM "t_supan_1" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "t_supan_2" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "t_supan_3" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
SELECT last("value") FROM "h_supan_1" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

options.content: POWER USAGE PANEL

targets.query: SELECT cumulative_sum(mean("value")) FROM "pow_supan_1" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT cumulative_sum(mean("value")) FROM "pow_supan_2" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT cumulative_sum(mean("value")) FROM "pow_supan_3" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "pow_supan_1" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "pow_supan_2" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "pow_supan_3" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT (mean("value")  / 1000)*24*4 FROM "pow_supan_1" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT (mean("value")  / 1000)*24*4 FROM "pow_supan_2" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT (mean("value")  / 1000)*24*4 FROM "pow_supan_3" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT (mean("value")  / 1000)*30*24*4 FROM "pow_supan_1" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT (mean("value")  / 1000)*30*24*4 FROM "pow_supan_2" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT (mean("value")  / 1000)*30*24*4 FROM "pow_supan_3" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "pow_supan_1" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "pow_supan_2" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)
SELECT mean("value") FROM "pow_supan_3" WHERE $timeFilter GROUP BY time(1d) fill(null)

options.content: ALARM PANEL

targets.query: SELECT first("value") FROM "supan_alarm_status" WHERE time >= now() - 1h AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(linear)
SELECT last("value") FROM "supan_alarm_status" WHERE topic = btg_alarm_status_supan AND "value" < 10 GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(none)
